en.TnCGroupbimaInsuranceBrokingPvtLtdFirstP: Groupfit Insurance Broking Pvt. Limited (hereinafter referred to as Groupbima) operates the website http://www.groupbima.com to provide consumers choice and an easy way to buy Insurance products from multiple Insurance companies.Groupbima is not an insurance company. Groupbima is a licensed Insurance Broking Company holding a Broking license from the Indian Insurance Regulator – Insurance Regulatory and Development Authority.
en.TnCDirectBrokerCodeText: Groupbima is not an insurance company. Groupbima is a licensed Insurance Broking Company holding a Broking license from the Indian Insurance Regulator – Insurance Regulatory and Development Authority.
en.OurParticipatingInsuranceParagraph: Our participating insurance providers supply some of the information available on the Website and therefore there may be inaccuracies in the Website Information over which Groupbima has limited control.
en.CoverfoxDoesNotWarrantParagraph: Groupbima does not warrant or guarantee the Timeliness, accuracy or completeness of the Website Information; or Quality of the results obtained from the use of the Website.
en.TOtheMaximumExtentPermittedParagraph: To the maximum extent permitted by law, Groupbima has no liability in relation to or arising out of the Website Information and Website recommendations. You are responsible for the final choice of your product and you should take time to read through all the information supplied before proceeding. If you are in any doubt regarding a product or its terms you should seek further advice from Groupbima or the relevant participating provider before choosing your product.
en.CoverfoxMayPassOnYourPersonalInformation: Groupbima may pass on your personal information to the relevant participating provider if you apply to purchase a product through www.groupbima.com, however, Groupbima does not guarantee when or if you will actually acquire the product that you have chosen. Groupbima does not accept any liability arising out of circumstances where there is a delay in you acquiring the product you have chosen.
en.PleaseNoteThatCoverFoxParagraph: Please note that Groupbima is only collecting or assisting in collecting the premium deposit on behalf of the insurer you have chosen to buy the policy. The acceptance of the deposit as premium and final issuance of the policy is subject to the underwriting norms and discretion of the Insurer whose policy you have chosen to buy on which Groupbima has no control. Groupbima will ensure that the amount is refunded by the insurer in case there is no ultimate issuance of the policy.
en.ByVisitingOurWebsiteParagraph: By visiting our website and accessing the information, resources, services, products, and tools we provide, you understand and agree to accept and adhere to the following terms and conditions as stated in this policy (hereafter referred to as ‘User Agreement’), along with the terms and conditions as stated in our Privacy Policy (please refer to the Privacy Policy section below for more information).
en.ThisAgreementIsInEffectParagraph: This agreement is in effect as of Oct 02, 2013.
en.WeReserveTheRightToChangeParagraph: We reserve the right to change this User Agreement from time to time without notice. You acknowledge and agree that it is your responsibility to review this User Agreement periodically to familiarize yourself with any modifications. Your continued use of this site after such modifications will constitute acknowledgment and agreement of the modified terms and conditions.
en.ByVisitingOurWebsiteAndAccessingTheInfor: By visiting our website and accessing the information, resources, services, products, and tools we provide for you, either directly or indirectly (hereafter referred to as ‘Resources’), you agree to use these Resources only for the purposes intended as permitted by (a) the terms of this User Agreement, and (b) applicable laws, regulations and generally accepted online practices or guidelines.
en.InOrderToAccessOurResourcesParagraph: In order to access our Resources, you may be required to provide certain information about yourself (such as identification, contact details, etc.) as part of the registration process, or as part of your ability to use the Resources. You agree that any information you provide will always be accurate, correct, and up to date.
en.YouAreResponsibleForConfidentialityParag: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of any login information associated with any account you use to access our Resources. Accordingly, you are responsible for all activities that occur under your account/s.
en.AccessingAnyOfOurResourcesByAnyMeans: Accessing (or attempting to access) any of our Resources by any means other than through the means we provide, is strictly prohibited. You specifically agree not to access (or attempt to access) any of our Resources through any automated, unethical or unconventional means.
en.EngagingInAnyActivityThatDisruptsParagra: Engaging in any activity that disrupts or interferes with our Resources, including the servers and/or networks to which our Resources are located or connected, is strictly prohibited.
en.AttemptingToCopyStrictlyProhibited: Attempting to copy, duplicate, reproduce, sell, trade, or resell our Resources is strictly prohibited.
en.YouAreSolelyResposible: You are solely responsible any consequences, losses, or damages that we may directly or indirectly incur or suffer due to any unauthorized activities conducted by you, as explained above, and may incur criminal or civil liability.
en.WeMayProvideVariousOpenCommunicationTool: We may provide various open communication tools on our website, such as blog comments, blog posts, public chat, forums, message boards, newsgroups, product ratings and reviews, various social media services, etc. You understand that generally we do not pre-screen or monitor the content posted by users of these various communication tools, which means that if you choose to use these tools to submit any type of content to our website, then it is your personal responsibility to use these tools in a responsible and ethical manner.
en.ByPostingInformation: By posting information or otherwise using any open communication tools as mentioned, you agree that you will not upload, post, share or otherwise distribute any content that:
en.IsIllegalThreateningDefamatory: Is illegal, threatening, defamatory, abusive, harassing, degrading, intimidating, fraudulent, deceptive, invasive, racist, or contains any type of suggestive, inappropriate, or explicit language;
en.InfringsOnAnyTrademark: Infringes on any trademark, patent, trade secret, copyright, or other proprietary rights of any party;
en.ContainsAnyTypeOfUnauthorized: Contains any type of unauthorized or unsolicited advertising;
en.ImpersonateAnyPersonOrEntity: Impersonates any person or entity, including any http://www.Groupbima.com/ employees or representatives.
en.WeHaveTheRightAtOurSoleDiscreion: We have the right at our sole discretion to remove any content that, we feel in our judgment does not comply with this User Agreement, along with any content that we feel is otherwise offensive, harmful, objectionable, inaccurate, or violates any 3rd party copyrights or trademarks. We are not responsible for any delay or failure in removing such content. If you post content that we choose to remove, you hereby consent to such removal, and consent to waive any claim against us.
en.WeDontAssumeAnyLiability: We do not assume any liability for any content posted by you or any other 3rd party users of our website. However, any content posted by you using any open communication tools on our website, provided that it doesn’t violate or infringe on any 3rd party copyrights or trademarks, becomes the property of Groupbima Insurance Broking Pvt. Ltd., and as such, gives us a perpetual, irrevocable, worldwide, royalty-free, exclusive license to reproduce, modify, adapt, translate, publish, publicly display and/or distribute as we see fit. This only refers and applies to content posted via open communication tools as described, and does not refer to information that is provided as part of the registration process, necessary in order to use our Resources. All information provided as part of our registration process is covered by our privacy policy.
en.YouAgreeToIndemnify: You agree to indemnify and hold harmless Groupbima Insurance Broking Pvt. Ltd. and its parent company and affiliates, and their directors, officers, managers, employees, donors, agents, and licensors, from and against all losses, expenses, damages and costs, including reasonable attorneys' fees, resulting from any violation of this User Agreement or the failure to fulfill any obligations relating to your account incurred by you or any other person using your account. We reserve the right to take over the exclusive defense of any claim for which we are entitled to indemnification under this User Agreement. In such event, you shall provide us with such cooperation as is reasonably requested by us.
en.ByUsingOurWebsiteYouUnderstandAndAgreePa: By using our website, you understand and agree that all Resources we provide are “as is” and “as available”. This means that we do not represent or warrant to you that:
en.UseOfOurResourcesWillMeetRequirements: The use of our Resources will meet your needs or requirements.
en.UseOfOurResourcesWillUninterrupted: The use of our Resources will be uninterrupted, timely, secure or free from errors.
en.InformationObtained: The information obtained by using our Resources will be accurate or reliable, and
en.AnyDefectsInTheOperation: Any defects in the operation or functionality of any Resources we provide will be repaired or corrected.
en.FurthermoreUnderstand: Furthermore, you understand and agree that:
en.AnyContentDownloadedOrOtherwise: Any content downloaded or otherwise obtained through the use of our Resources is done at your own discretion and risk, and that you are solely responsible for any damage to your computer or other devices for any loss of data that may result from the download of such content.
en.NoInformationOrAdvice: No information or advice, whether expressed, implied, oral or written, obtained by you from Groupbima Insurance Broking Pvt. Ltd. or through any Resources we provide shall create any warranty, guarantee, or conditions of any kind, except for those expressly outlined in this User Agreement.
en.InConjuctionWithTheLimitationOfWarrantie: In conjunction with the Limitation of Warranties as explained above, you expressly understand and agree that any claim against us shall be limited to the amount you paid, if any, for use of products and/or services. Groupfit Insurance Broking Pvt. Ltd. will not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, consequential or exemplary loss or damages which may be incurred by you as a result of using our Resources, or as a result of any changes, data loss or corruption, cancellation, loss of access, or downtime to the full extent that applicable limitation of liability laws apply.
en.AllContentAndMaterialsAvailable: All content and materials available on http://www.groupbima.com, including but not limited to text, graphics, website name, code, images, and logos are the intellectual property of Groupfit Insurance Broking Pvt. Ltd., and are protected by applicable copyright and trademark law. Any inappropriate use, including but not limited to the reproduction, distribution, display or transmission of any content on this site is strictly prohibited, unless specifically authorized by Groupfit Insurance Broking Pvt. Ltd.
en.YouAgreeThatWeMay: We may, at our sole discretion, suspend or terminate your access to all or part of our website and Resources without prior notice. We reserve the right to remove or delete any information that we may have, regarding your account.
en.ThisWebsiteIsControlledByGroupfit: This website is controlled by GroupFit from our offices located in Delhi, India. This User Agreement and the Privacy Policy shall be governed and construed in accordance with laws of Delhi, India. Judicial courts located in Delhi, India shall have exclusive jurisdiction on all matters and disputes arising out of and relating to this site.
en.FurthermoreAnyActionToEnforce: Furthermore, any action to enforce this User Agreement shall be brought in the federal or state courts located in India, Maharashtra You hereby agree to personal jurisdiction by such courts, and waive any jurisdictional, venue, or inconvenient forum objections to such courts.
en.UnlessOtherwiseExpressedGroupfit: UNLESS OTHERWISE EXPRESSED, Groupfit Insurance Broking Pvt. Ltd. EXPRESSLY DISCLAIMS ALL WARRANTIES AND CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, WHETHER EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES AND CONDITIONS OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AND NON-INFRINGEMENT.
en.IfYouHaveAnyQuestionsOrCommentsParagraph: If you have any questions or comments about these our Terms of Service as outlined above, you can contact us at:

mr.TnCGroupbimaInsuranceBrokingPvtLtdFirstP: ग्रुप बिमा इन्शुरन्स ब्रोकिंग प्रा. लिमिटेड (यापुढे कव्हरफॉक्स म्हणून संदर्भित) ऑपरेट करते ग्राहकांना पर्याय आणि विमा खरेदी करण्याचा सोपा मार्ग प्रदान करण्यासाठी वेबसाइट http://www.coverfox.com एकाधिक विमा कंपन्यांकडून उत्पादने. कव्हरफॉक्स ही एक विमा कंपनी नाही. कव्हरफॉक्स आहे  भारतीय विमातून ब्रोकिंग परवान्यासह परवानाकृत विमा ब्रोकिंग कंपनी नियामक - विमा नियामक आणि विकास प्राधिकरण.
mr.TnCDirectBrokerCodeText: आयआरडीए थेट ब्रोकर कोड: आयआरडीए / डीबी 556/16
mr.OurParticipatingInsuranceParagraph: आमचे सहभागी विमा प्रदाता वेबसाइटवर उपलब्ध असलेल्या काही माहिती पुरवतात आणि म्हणूनच वेबसाइट माहितीमधील चुकीची माहिती असू शकते ज्यावर कव्हरफॉक्स मर्यादित नियंत्रणाखाली आहे.
mr.CoverfoxDoesNotWarrantParagraph: कव्हरफॉक्स वेबसाइटच्या वापरापासून मिळालेल्या परिणामांची वेबसाइट माहिती किंवा गुणवत्ता पूर्णत्व, अचूकता किंवा पूर्णत्व हमी देत नाही किंवा हमी देत नाही.
mr.TOtheMaximumExtentPermittedParagraph: कायद्याने परवानगी असलेल्या कमाल मर्यादेपर्यंत, वेबसाइट माहिती आणि वेबसाइट शिफारसींशी संबंधित किंवा उद्भवणार्या कव्हरफॉक्सची कोणतीही जबाबदारी नाही. आपण आपल्या उत्पादनाच्या अंतिम निवडीसाठी जबाबदार आहात आणि पुढे जाण्यापूर्वी पुरविलेल्या सर्व माहिती वाचण्यासाठी आपण वेळ द्यावा. एखाद्या उत्पादनाबद्दल किंवा त्याच्या अटींबद्दल आपल्याला कोणत्याही शंका असल्यास आपण आपल्या उत्पादनाची निवड करण्यापूर्वी कव्हरफॉक्स किंवा संबंधित सहभागी प्रदात्याकडून पुढील सल्ला घेणे आवश्यक आहे.
mr.CoverfoxMayPassOnYourPersonalInformation: जर आपण www.coverfox.com वरून एखादे उत्पादन खरेदी करण्यासाठी अर्ज केले तर कव्हरफॉक्स आपल्या संबंधित माहितीस संबंधित सहभागी प्रदात्याकडे पाठवू शकते, तथापि, आपण निवडलेल्या उत्पादनास खरोखर किंवा खरोखर प्राप्त होईल तेव्हा कव्हरफॉक्स हमी देत नाही. आपण निवडलेल्या उत्पादनामध्ये विलंब होत असताना परिस्थितीतून उत्पन्न होणारी कोणतीही जबाबदारी कव्हरफॉक्स स्वीकारत नाही
mr.PleaseNoteThatCoverFoxParagraph: कृपया लक्षात घ्या की कव्हरफॉक्स केवळ आपण पॉलिसी खरेदी करण्यासाठी निवडलेल्या विमा कंपनीच्या वतीने प्रीमियम ठेव जमा करण्यास एकत्रित किंवा सहाय्य करत आहे. प्रीमियमची रक्कम आणि पॉलिसीची अंतिम अंमलबजावणीची स्वीकृती, अंडरराइटिंग मानदंड आणि विमा कंपनीचा विवेकबुद्धीचा विषय आहे ज्याचे आपण खरेदी करण्यासाठी निवडले आहे ज्यावर कव्हरफॉक्सवर नियंत्रण नाही. पॉलिसीची अंतिम अंमलबजावणी नसेल तर इन्शुरन्सद्वारे रक्कम परत केली जाईल अशी कव्हरफॉक्स खात्री करेल.
mr.ByVisitingOurWebsiteParagraph: आमच्या वेबसाइटला भेट देऊन आणि माहिती, संसाधने, सेवा, उत्पादने आणि साधनांमध्ये प्रवेश करून आपण समजून घेता आणि सहमत होता या पॉलिसीमध्ये नमूद केल्याप्रमाणे खालील अटी व नियमांचे पालन करा आणि त्यानुसार (त्या नंतर पुढे 'वापरकर्ता करार' म्हणून संदर्भित) पालन करा आमच्या निजता धोरणानुसार नमूद अटी व शर्ती (अधिक माहितीसाठी कृपया खाली असलेल्या निवेदना धोरण विभागाचा संदर्भ घ्या)..
mr.ThisAgreementIsInEffectParagraph: हा करार 02 ऑक्टोबर 2013 पर्यंत प्रभावी आहे.
mr.WeReserveTheRightToChangeParagraph: या वापरकर्ता करारात वेळोवेळी बदल केल्याशिवाय आम्ही बदलण्याचा अधिकार राखून ठेवतो. आपण कबूल करता आणि सहमत आहात की ही आपली जबाबदारी आहे कोणत्याही बदलांसह स्वत: परिचित करण्यासाठी या वापरकर्ता कराराचे नियमितपणे पुनरावलोकन करा. अशा बदलांनंतर या साइटचा आपला सतत वापर सुधारित नियम व अटींचे पावती आणि करार तयार करेल.
mr.ByVisitingOurWebsiteAndAccessingTheInfor: आमच्या वेबसाइटला भेट देऊन आणि थेट, अप्रत्यक्षरित्या आम्ही आपल्यासाठी प्रदान केलेली माहिती, संसाधने, सेवा, उत्पादने आणि साधने वाप (त्यानंतर पुढे 'संसाधने' म्हणून संदर्भित), आपण या संसाधनांचा वापर केवळ ()) या वापरकर्त्याच्या अटींद्वारे परवानगी असलेल्या उद्देशांसाठी वापरण्यास सहमत आहात. करार आणि (बी) लागू कायदे, नियम आणि सामान्यपणे स्वीकारल्या गेलेल्या ऑनलाइन पद्धती किंवा मार्गदर्शक तत्त्वे.
mr.InOrderToAccessOurResourcesParagraph: आमच्या संसाधनांमध्ये प्रवेश करण्यासाठी, आपल्याला आपल्याबद्दलची काही माहिती प्रदान करणे आवश्यक आहे (जसे की ओळख, संपर्क तपशील इ.) नोंदणी प्रक्रियेचा एक भाग म्हणून किंवा स्त्रोतांचा वापर करण्याच्या आपल्या क्षमतेचा भाग म्हणून. आपण सहमत आहात की आपण प्रदान केलेली कोणतीही माहिती नेहमीच अचूक असेल, योग्य, आणि अद्ययावत.
mr.YouAreResponsibleForConfidentialityParag: आपण आमच्या स्रोतांमध्ये प्रवेश करण्यासाठी वापरलेल्या कोणत्याही खात्याशी संबंधित कोणत्याही लॉग इन माहितीची गोपनीयता राखण्यासाठी आपण जबाबदार आहात. त्यानुसार,आपल्या खात्याखालील सर्व क्रियाकलापांसाठी आपण जबाबदार आहात.
mr.AccessingAnyOfOurResourcesByAnyMeans: आमच्या उपलब्ध असलेल्या साधनांव्यतिरिक्त इतर कोणत्याही स्रोताद्वारे आमच्या कोणत्याही स्रोतावर प्रवेश करणे (किंवा प्रवेश करण्याचा प्रयत्न करणे) कठोरपणे प्रतिबंधित आहे. आपण विशेषतः सहमत नाही कोणत्याही स्वयंचलित, अनैतिक किंवा अपरंपरागत माध्यमांद्वारे आमच्या कोणत्याही स्रोतांचा प्रवेश (किंवा प्रवेश करण्याचा प्रयत्न) करणे.
mr.EngagingInAnyActivityThatDisruptsParagra: आमच्या संसाधने स्थीत किंवा कनेक्ट केलेल्या सर्व्हर आणि / किंवा नेटवर्क समेत आमच्या संसाधनांमध्ये व्यत्यय आणणारी किंवा हस्तक्षेप करणार्या कोणत्याही गतिविधीमध्ये गुंतवणे, कठोरपणे प्रतिबंधित आहे.
mr.ByUsingOurWebsiteYouUnderstandAndAgreePa: आमच्या वेबसाइटचा वापर करुन,आपण समजून घेता आणि सहमत आहात की आम्ही प्रदान केलेली सर्व संसाधने 'जसे आहेत' आणि 'उपलब्ध आहेत' आहेत. याचा अर्थ आम्ही आपल्यास प्रतिनिधित्व करीत नाही किंवा हमी देत नाही की:
mr.IfYouHaveAnyQuestionsOrCommentsParagraph: वरील आमच्या बाह्य सेवा अटींबद्दल आपल्याला काही प्रश्न किंवा टिप्पण्या असल्यास, आपण आमच्याशी येथे संपर्क साधू शकता:
mr.groupbimaAddressParagraph: ग्रुपबिमा इन्शुरन्स ब्रोकिंग प्रा. लिमिटेड एम्बिन्स कोर्ट, 1001, सेक्टर नं. 1 9 डी, वाशी, नवी मुंबई, महाराष्ट्र 400703
